name: 0 - Outro
_source: add_portrait;Pam;Right
speak;Pam; Grr, everyone, let's hit the seas and retreat!{w} I'm sorry to disappoint you, my thirsty magic{tgm}...
remove_portrait;Pam
transition;close
change_background;Ship
transition;open
music;Triumph
if;u('Mia').team == 'player' and not u('Mia').dead and not u('Nelson').dead
multi_add_portrait;Emma;MidLeft;Caroline;FarLeft;Nelson;MidRight
expression;Emma;Smile
speak;Emma; I can't believe we actually won{tgm}...{tgm}{w} They had us surrounded from both sides!
expression;Nelson;Smile
speak;Nelson; That was a mighty fine battle!{w} And I'm finally free from the hands of my homeland.
expression;Emma;NoSmile
expression;Nelson;NoSmile
speak;Caroline; You're from Umbra?
speak;Nelson; Aye, I was.{w} There's not much left of my hometown after the demons razed it,{w} so I've been on the run and jumping around from town to town,{w} just trying to make a living.
bop_portrait;Emma
speak;Emma; That sounds just like our story!
speak;Nelson; What do you mean by that?
speak;Caroline; Demons attacked our town too, and turned our neighbors into corpses.{w} Apparently it's been happening all over.{w} We're not sure what's happening, but we're trying to fight it.
speak;Nelson; I've heard a lot of rumors in my travels, but{tgm}...{tgm}{w} I eavesdropped on a Druid once who mentioned how Umbra made a deal with demons for power.
bop_portrait;Emma
speak;Emma; Deals with demons?!{w} Why would someone ever make such a deal?!
speak;Nelson; Word on the wind is that the demons are supplying endless soldiers,{w} in exchange for a steady supply of corpses for their capital from Umbra.
add_portrait;Mia;FarRight

speak;Mia; I believe it.{w} Those bastards destroyed my town,{w} and I was barely able to grab my family and escape with my life.{w} My folks{tgm}...{tgm}{w} They've got some weird infection,{w} and I've got to send a stead supply of money if I want to keep them alive{tgm}...
speak;Emma; Oh that's{tgm}...{tgm} That's{tgm}...{tgm}horrible{tgm}...
speak;Caroline; But why would Umbra do that?{w} They're gaining nothing from killing their own civilians.
speak;Mia; Wrong. They gain mindless, unquestioning, unfeeling, undead soldiers.
speak;Caroline; Even more of a reason to come to Rosefall's aid, I say.{w} The captain told me that we'd hit land in an hour tops.
speak;Emma;Hope that Emily's stomach can handle it...;;;thought_bubble;no_talk
speak;Emma; We should prepare as much as we can before we arrive.{w} We don't know what's waiting for us.
speak;Caroline; Whatever it is, I wouldn't expect a warm welcome, that's for sure.
multi_remove_portrait;Emma;Caroline;Mia;Nelson
else
multi_add_portrait;Emma;Left;Caroline;Right
expression;Emma;Smile
speak;Emma; I can't believe we actually won{tgm}...{tgm}{w} They had us surrounded from both sides!
expression;Emma;NoSmile
speak;Caroline; We should count ourselves lucky. They don't normally retreat easily{tgm}...
bop_portrait;Emma
speak;Emma; But we did it!{w} Although, I'm worried that they were coming from the direction of Rosefall.
speak;Caroline; Even more of a reason to come to Rosefall's aid, I say.{w} The captain told me that we'd hit land in an hour tops.
speak;Emma;Hope that Emily's stomach can handle it...;;;thought_bubble;no_talk
speak;Emma; We should prepare as much as we can before we arrive.{w} We don't know what's waiting for us.
speak;Caroline; Whatever it is, I wouldn't expect a warm welcome, that's for sure.
multi_remove_portrait;Caroline;Emma
end
